body_html:
@DimanNe My apologies. You are indeed just creating a composite op using the C++ interface. What I was referring to was cases in the past where people would add a specialized C++ kernel for computing a gradient, in which case the automatic differentiation would have no way of acting on it.

I think what you have here is fine. @skye can you confirm this?
